title: A prettie newe ballad, intytuled: the crowe sits vpon the wall, please one and please all To the tune of, please one and please all.
author: Tarlton, Richard, d. 1588.
publisher: for Henry Kyrkham, dwelling at the little North doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boy,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
